name: Into The Forest (megalukes)
description:
"There was once a beautiful Forest, that fell to a strange curse. Now it's crowded with strange creatures, shadows of what once were the animals that inhabited it. Sometimes a lost soul gets caught into its grasp, prisoned forever in a deadly trap. The only way out is to venture deeper into the forest and discover the secret behind its curse before you become a victim of it."

Developed by Fabio Lino, Felipe Cunha and Lucas Felix.

PS: A bit buggy, but playable.
